item.title: 殖民地管道公司回应对汽油运输变更提议的抗议
item.description: 殖民地管道公司周一要求美国联邦能源管理委员会驳回托运人对其汽油运输方式拟议变更提出的抗议，辩称这些变更符合行业惯例，也在殖民地公司的权限范围之内。【原文：The Colonial Pipeline on Monday asked the U.S. Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to reject shippers' protests over proposed changes to how it moves gasoline, arguing that the modifications are in line with industry practices and within Colonial's authority.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，量子计算初创公司 PsiQuantum 以 60 亿美元的估值至少融资 7.5 亿美元
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，量子计算初创公司 PsiQuantum 正在以 60 亿美元的投前估值筹集至少 7.5 亿美元。【原文：Quantum computing startup PsiQuantum is raising at least $750 million at a $6 billion pre-money valuation, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国小米拟配售融资 55 亿美元用于业务扩张
item.description: 中国小米公司（Xiaomi Corp）周二表示，该公司正寻求通过配售融资共426亿港元（54.8亿美元），以加速业务扩张。【原文：China's Xiaomi Corp said on Tuesday it is looking to raise an aggregate of HK$42.6 billion ($5.48 billion) via a placement in a bid to accelerate business expansion.】

item.title: Trump Media 与 Crypto.com 合作，在 Truth.Fi 上推出交易所交易基金
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的媒体公司特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）周一表示，它将与 Crypto.com 合作，通过其 Truth.Fi 品牌推出交易所交易基金和产品。【原文：President Donald Trump's media company Trump Media & Technology Group said on Monday it is partnering with Crypto.com to launch exchange-traded funds and products through its Truth.Fi brand.】

item.title: 交易日：关税担忧降温，科技股炙手可热
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，波音公司寻求撤回就 737 MAX 喷气式飞机致命坠毁事件达成的认罪协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引两位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，波音公司正在寻求撤回早些时候达成的认罪协议，该协议涉及一桩旷日持久的刑事案件，该案件指责波音公司在 737 MAX 喷气式飞机发生两起致命坠机事故之前欺骗了监管机构。【原文：Boeing is seeking to withdraw an earlier agreement to plead guilty in a long-running criminal case that blamed the company for deceiving regulators before two deadly crashes of 737 MAX jets, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：Dropbox 面临激进投资者的压力，要求终止联合创始人的控制权
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，云存储提供商 Dropbox 正面临一位激进投资者的压力，要求其结束创始人对公司的控制。【原文：Cloud storage provider Dropbox is facing pressure from an activist investor to end founder control of the company, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 Verge 报道，X 公司工程总监已离职
item.description: 据 The Verge 周一援引知情人士的话报道，社交媒体平台 X 的工程总监王浩飞突然离职。【原文：Social media platform X's director of engineering, Haofei Wang, has suddenly left the company, the Verge reported on Monday, citing sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 联邦调查局称正在调查 "针对特斯拉的暴力活动增加 "一事
item.description: 联邦调查局局长卡什-帕特尔（Kash Patel）周一表示，该局正在调查他所称的 "针对特斯拉的暴力活动的增加"，并补充说该局最近几天已采取措施打击此类事件。【原文：FBI Director Kash Patel said on Monday the bureau was probing what he called "the increase in violent activity toward Tesla," adding the bureau had taken steps in recent days to crackdown on such incidents.】

item.title: 特朗普扩大贸易战，矛头直指委内瑞拉能源行业，并计划很快对该行业征收关税
item.description: 特朗普说，美国将在 "不久的将来 "对汽车、药品和铝征收关税，理由是一旦发生战争或其他问题，美国将需要所有这些产品。【原文：Trump said the US would impose tariffs on autos, pharmaceutical and aluminum in "the very near future," arguing that the US would need all those products in the event of wars or other problems.】

item.title: 空中客车公司称正在就国防和太空支出激增进行谈判
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）高级管理人员在周一举行的一次公司活动上表示，随着欧洲大陆增加支出，该公司正与欧洲国家商讨新的国防和太空订单，并看到其核心喷气客机业务的供应链正在改善。【原文：Airbus is in discussions with European nations on new defence and space orders as the continent increases spending and is seeing an improvement in supply chains for its core jetliner business, senior executives said at a company event on Monday.】

item.title: ELFA 称，2 月份美国商业设备借款年同比下降超过 7
item.description: 美国设备租赁与融资协会（ELFA）周一称，与去年同期相比，2月份美国公司的设备投资融资借款减少了7.4%。【原文：U.S. companies borrowed 7.4% less to finance equipment investments in February compared with the same period a year earlier, the Equipment Leasing and Finance Association (ELFA) said on Monday.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂将油桶运往西部，美国航空燃油进口激增
item.description: 贸易分析师和仓储经纪人表示，在尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂将桶装航空燃油运往北美后，美国 3 月份的航空燃油进口量将创下两年来的新高，这将降低夏季旅游旺季的航空燃油价格。【原文：U.S. jet fuel imports are set to hit a two-year high in March after Nigeria's Dangote refinery pushed barrels to North America, which should lower prices of the aviation fuel in the peak summer travel season, trade analysts and storage brokers said.】

item.title: 亚特兰大联储主席博斯蒂克认为今年只会降息一次
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他预计未来几个月通胀方面的进展将放缓，因此目前认为美联储在今年年底之前只会将基准利率下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said he anticipates slower progress on inflation in coming months and as a result now sees the Fed cutting its benchmark interest rate only a quarter of a percentage point by the end of this year.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利再次呼吁采取联合行动应对贸易紧张局势
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）周一再次呼吁世界各经济体开展合作，以化解全球贸易体系的紧张局势。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey reiterated on Monday his call for cooperation among the world's economies to resolve strains in the global trading system, which is facing upheaval from the policies of U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Altman 表示，OpenAI 首席运营官将在扩大后的职位上领导全球增长和合作伙伴关系
item.description: OpenAI 首席运营官布拉德-莱特凯普（Brad Lightcap）将负责全球扩张和企业合作，首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）周一表示，微软支持的这家初创公司正努力巩固其在快速增长的人工智能产业中的主导地位。【原文：OpenAI's Chief Operating Officer Brad Lightcap will oversee global expansion and corporate partnerships, CEO Sam Altman said on Monday, as the Microsoft-backed startup seeks to cement its dominance in the fast-growing AI industry.】

item.title: 参议员敦促特朗普寻求国会授权延长 TikTok 的销售期限
item.description: 三位民主党参议员周一敦促白宫寻求国会授权，延长中国字节跳动公司出售流行社交媒体应用 TikTok 的最后期限，否则将导致其被禁售。【原文：Three Democratic senators on Monday urged the White House to seek authority from Congress to extend a deadline for China's ByteDance to sell popular social media app TikTok or result in its ban.】

item.title: 沃尔玛与摩根大通合作加快向在线卖家付款的速度
item.description: 摩根大通和沃尔玛正在合作加快通过该零售巨头网站销售商品的商家的付款速度。【原文：JPMorgan Chase and Walmart are partnering to speed up payments for merchants that sell items through the retail giant's website.】

item.title: 独家报道马萨诸塞州监管机构就 "疯狂三月 "篮球博彩活动对 Robinhood 进行调查
item.description: 马萨诸塞州最高证券监管机构已对交易平台 Robinhood 推出预测市场中心的决定展开调查，该中心允许用户对包括 "疯狂三月 "大学篮球赛在内的一系列事件的结果进行投注。【原文：Massachusetts' top securities regulator has launched an investigation into trading platform Robinhood's decision to launch a prediction-markets hub that allows users to bet on the outcomes of a range of events, including March Madness college basketball tournaments.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称美联储有望恢复正现金流
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的分析师在周一的一份报告中说，美联储似乎即将结束历史性的连续亏损，这反过来又可能使其回到向财政部返还现金的轨道上来。【原文：The Federal Reserve appears to be on the threshold of ending a historic streak of losses, which in turn could get it back on track to returning cash to the Treasury somewhere down the line, analysts at Morgan Stanley said in a note on Monday.】

item.title: 23andMe 从 DNA 检测先驱到破产的历程
item.description: 周日，23andMe 申请破产，原因是其祖先测试工具需求不振，同时该公司正努力控制大范围数据泄露事件对声誉造成的损害。【原文：23andMe filed for bankruptcy on Sunday, hit by faltering demand for its ancestry testing kits as it struggled to contain the reputational damage from a widespread data breach.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：汇丰考虑外包部分固定收益交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社周一援引熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道称，汇丰银行正在考虑将部分固定收益交易订单流外包给第三方公司。【原文：HSBC is considering outsourcing some of its fixed income trading order flow to a third-party firm, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普表示希望美联储降低利率
item.description: 在美国央行上周维持利率不变之后，唐纳德-特朗普总统周一敦促美联储降低利率。【原文：President Donald Trump urged the Federal Reserve on Monday to lower interest rates after the U.S. central bank last week kept them unchanged.】

item.title: 分析师预测，美国政府最快可能在 7 月面临违约风险
item.description: 美国两党政策中心（Bipartisan Policy Center）智库周一预计，除非国会采取行动提高华盛顿的借贷上限，否则美国政府将在7月中旬至10月初的某个时候面临36.6万亿美元债务违约的风险。【原文：The U.S. government will risk defaulting on some of its $36.6 trillion in debt sometime between mid-July and early October unless Congress acts to raise the cap on Washington's borrowing limit, the Bipartisan Policy Center think tank projected on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将很快宣布对汽车、铝和药品征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他将在不久的将来宣布对汽车、铝和药品征收关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he will in the very near future announce tariffs on automobiles, aluminum and pharmaceuticals.】

item.title: 欧洲立法者敦促欧盟委员会尽快出台《芯片法 2.0
item.description: 欧洲议会议员周一敦促欧盟委员会为该地区的半导体产业启动一项新的支持计划，针对人工智能芯片和其他技术差距进行投资。【原文：Members of the European Parliament on Monday urged the European Commission to launch a new support programme for the region's semiconductor industry targeting investment in AI chips and other technological gaps.】

item.title: 消息称 Marex 集团收购仓储公司 Edgemere Terminals
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，Marex 集团已经收购了仓储和物流公司 Edgemere Terminals，该公司没有足够的资金来满足伦敦金属交易所新的资本充足率规定。【原文：Marex Group has bought warehousing and logistics company Edgemere Terminals, which did not have the money to meet the London Metal Exchange's new capital adequacy rules, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 商务部长对苹果公司首席执行官说：欢迎苹果公司扩大在华投资
item.description: 中国商务部的一份声明显示，中国商务部长周一对苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）表示，欢迎苹果公司扩大在中国的投资。【原文：China's commerce minister told Apple CEO Tim Cook on Monday that the company is welcome to expand investment in the country, a ministry statement showed.】

item.title: 特斯拉跳涨，因可能的关税回旋余地和较低的股价吸引投资者
item.description: 据报道，特朗普政府可能在 4 月 2 日实施对等征税的同时，排除一系列针对特定行业的关税，特斯拉股价周一上涨了 10%。【原文：Tesla shares rose 10% on Monday following reports the Trump administration is likely to exclude a set of sector-specific tariffs while applying reciprocal levies on April 2.】

item.title: 空客称下一架喷气机是 "进化而非革命
item.description: 空中客车公司首席执行官纪尧姆-福瑞（Guillaume Faury）周二表示，该公司的下一款单通道喷气机将是 "进化型而非革命性的"，但其中可能包括一款开放式转子发动机，例如供应商 CFM 公司正在研究的一款发动机。【原文：Airbus CEO Guillaume Faury said on Tuesday the planemaker's next single-aisle jet would be "evolutionary rather than revolutionary", but that this could include an open-rotor engine such as one being studied by supplier CFM .】
